document.full_text: the police found the body of a 4-year-old girl in acapulco on thursday who had been shot in the chest, the fifth child killed in drug-related violence in the city in less than a week.
document.title: the americas: mexico: girl is 5th child killed in acapulco in a week
lines_and_colors: the police found the body of a 4-year-old girl in acapulco on thursday who had been shot in the chest, the fifth child killed in drug-related violence in the city in less than a week.
